titleStmt.title: Gautama Śikṣā Lomaśa Śikṣā Nārada Śikṣā Mātrālakṣaṇa Chandolakṣaṇa

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This manuscript contains multiple texts. The note before the first folio provides the list of the texts included in the manuscript. The information as followes -Gautama Śikṣā Lomaśa Śikṣā Nārada Śikṣā Mātrālakṣaṇa Chandolakṣaṇa Vedalakṣaṇa Granth 44 pages 8 lines 45 . First 7 folio are missing and folios after 30r are missing. Vedalakṣaṇa, a text listed in the front note is missing from the manuscript. New text begins immidiaetly after the completion of the privious text. The titles of each text is put in the left margin when the next text begins, which aids in identifying the beginning of the new text. Some purple color marks are seen on the folio for example folio number 7, 21 25, 27, 30

msItem.title: GautamaŚikṣā.
msItem.incipit:
gautam-8v 1 atha trayastriṃśadvyañjanāni bhavanti . sparśāntasthoṣmāṇaśceti . tatra kakārādayo makārāntāsparśāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ catvārontasthāste yaralavāścatvāraśco
gautam-8v 2 ṣmāṇaste śaṣasahāśceti anekavyañjanaṃ yatroparyyuparisaṃyuktaṃ tat saṃyoga sañjaṃ bhavatītyasvarañca pūrvamakṣaramathatrividhassaṃyogajo bhavatyaya
msItem.explicit:
gautam-10v 7 vṛddhīstnu mutaya iti sasatayamanakāraḥ prāndhmākhapibāseti gagadhayamamakāro murdhno viśvasyeti radadhayamanakāraḥ kāverajajayamamakāraḥ iti abodhādhiyyagnirjjma u
gautam-11r 3 ti eṣā sahasravarmārtmā nānāvartivibhūṣitā saṃyogaśṛṅkhalā nāma sāmavedanibandhanāt 7
msItem.finalRubric: gautam-11r3 iti dvitīyaprapāṭhakaḥ .. gautamaśikṣā gautam-11r 4 samāptā .. hariḥ oṃ

msItem.title: Lomaśa Śikṣā
msItem.incipit:
lomash-11r 4 lomaśīyāṃ pravakṣyāmi gargācārryeṇa cintitāṃ sābhidhānāṃ yathoktaṃtu ācāryevacanaṃ yathā 1 hrasvaṃ dīrghaṃ tathā
lomash-11r 5 vṛddhamabhigītantu sāmagāḥ muhurmṛgaṅgavatkuryuḥ sampātotthānasañjavat . 2
msItem.explicit: lomash-15r 2 gajate taṃ dṛśyate evaṃ yakārāvaktavyādhīdhānirgmanisarśanaṃ . 78 aṣṭamaḥ khaṇḍaḥ ..
msItem.finalRubric: lomash-15r 2 iti lomaśaśikṣāyāṃ prapāṭhakaḥ khaṇḍaḥ .. lomaśaśikṣā samāptā

msItem.title: Nārada Śikṣā
msItem.rubric: narad-15r 2 hariḥ oṃ . .. athānusvāraśāstrāṇāṃ saṃkṣedaṃ vedaniścayaṃ .
msItem.incipit: narad-15r 2 ucca narad-15r 3 nicaviśeṣādvisvarānyakaṃ pravartate .1. ārccikaṃ gāthikaṃ caiva sāmikañca svarantarabm .kṛtānte svaraśāstrāṇāṃ pra narad-15r 4 yoktavyam viśeṣataḥ .. 2. ekāntarasvarasvaro hṛkṣu gāthāsu dvyantarasvaraḥ sāmasu tryantaraṃ vidyāt devatāvat svarānta narad-15r 5 raṃ .. 3..
msItem.explicit: narad-26v 5 prayoktavyāḥ nāvyaktā na ca pīḍitāḥ samyag varṇaprayoge(na)[ṇa] brahmaloke mahīyate 32 .. aṣṭamaḥ …. narad-26v 6 dvitīyaḥ prapāṭhakaḥ ..
msItem.finalRubric: narad-26v 6 nāradīyaśikṣā samāptā .. hariḥ oṃ .. gurubhyo namaḥ .. avighnamastu .. .. oṃ

msItem.title: Mātrālakṣaṇa
msItem.incipit:
matra-27r 1 athto hrasvadīrghaplutamātrāṇyakṣarāṇi vyākhyāsyāma sva(lpa)mātramaṇumātrañca hrasvamamātrādīrghatve plutaṃ pṛthañceti trimāmabhidhīyate .. hrasvadvimā
matra-27r 2 trasaṃyuktandīrghamityabhidhīyate dīrghantrimātrasaṃyuktaṃ plutamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ .. plutantrimātrasayogādṛḍhamityabhidīyate .mātrārdhamātrācārdhyardhyamātrāma
matra-27r 3 dvemātre
msItem.explicit: matra-29v 4 t svarabhaktirardamātrā iti mātrāṇāmātrānāmasaṃpādyaḥ kālaḥ pratijñā khalu vartate pratijñā khalu vartate khaṇḍaḥ
msItem.finalRubric: matra-29v 4 iti mātrālakṣaṇaṃ saṃpū matra-29v 5 rṇaṃ .. hariḥ oṃ .. śrīrastu

msItem.title: Chandolakṣaṇa
msItem.incipit:
chandas-29v 5 oṃ athātaśchandasāṃ vi?? vyākhyāsyāmo gāyatryuṣṇiganuṣṭubbṛhatipaṅktistriṣṭubjagatitisa
chandas-29v6 ptāṣṭāṇyekākṣaripadādini caturakṣarādhikāni praticchandasaṃ gayatryādibāmutkṛtiravasārañchandasāmārṣalaukikañcacaturviṃsatyakṣarāgāyatrī
msItem.explicit: chandas-30r 7 yo stayo sstha stotārā sataḥ paṅktirviśrapādā saiva ca siddhā viṣṭari paṅktistāṇḍitaḥ pañcakaiścatustrirakṣarapaṅktiḥ kvacit dvābhyāṃ

support.p: No guard folio no blank folio.

extent.measure: No guard folio no blank folio. 7 folio are missing. 8r-30v written= 23 folio

supportDesc.foliation: Foliation continues. Tamil numeration in the left margin. First 7 folio are missing and folios after 30r are missing.

handNote.desc: Hand writing good but many times clusters are very confusing or unclear. Sometimes sign of ikāra is unclear.

additions.desc: Titles of each text are put in the left margin when the next text begins. on 8v GautamaŚikṣā is written in the left margin. on 11r Lomaśa Śikṣā is written in the left margin. on 15r Nārada Śikṣā is written in the left margin. on 27r Mātrālakṣaṇa is written in the left margin. on 29v Chandolakṣaṇa is written in the left margin.
On 8v hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin. On 11r and 29v oṃ is written in the left margin.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
